Engineering A desire Or Just a Career Option.....

Nov 3, 2016

Desire is infinite, its fulfilment limited, desire is unlimited in everyone; the power of fulfilment varies. Thus some are more successful than others in life. Engineering a desire or just a career option to get good life, good wife or good money. Itâ€™s what we always wanted to accomplish, everyone, when they are young knows what their destiny is, I thought of becoming the richest person. I think at a certain point in everyone lives, everything is clear and everything is possible, They are not afraid to dream and to yearn for everything they would like to see happen to them in their lives but as time passes an inner force begins to convince them that it will impossible for them to realize their destiny. But the thing is what we desire is most important rather than thinking of so called society that if you are an engineer you have a great future but if you are a photographer or a hair designer you are good for nothing, it is painful to listen that but ultimately we have our self respect and we will be happy in our life.We desire only the pleasurable not the painful. As desire increases, so increases the power of pleasure so the power of pain. But Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional. So, follow your dream love your desire. Future is the extension of present..
